text: "Faith" is a 1987 song by George Michael and is the second single from his debut studio album of the same name. It topped the single charts in Australia, Belgium, Canada, the Netherlands, New Zealand and the United States. It went to the top 5 in Austria, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Norway, Spain, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:George Michael songs Category:Limp Bizkit songs
title: Faith (George Michael song)
